title: Copilot Instructions Update - Helmsman Project
details:
Successfully analyzed and updated the .github/copilot-instructions.md file for the Helmsman project (ADHD-optimized task management system). 

Key changes made:
- Enhanced project overview to reflect current ADHD-focused features
- Added agent-specific Codex environment commands (TaskMaster, CreatePrd, CreateTasks)
- Updated development workflow commands with correct package management (pnpm for frontend/root, npm for backend)
- Added comprehensive code patterns for Zustand state management, NestJS services, and accessibility components
- Included ADHD-specific UI patterns with energy level colors and focus type indicators
- Enhanced testing patterns with accessibility-first approach using axe-core
- Added AI integration architecture for OpenAI service and Microsoft Graph integration
- Documented performance optimization guidelines for ADHD users

The updated file is now 479 lines and provides comprehensive guidance for AI coding assistants working on this ADHD-optimized full-stack application built with Next.js 14+, NestJS, PostgreSQL, and Prisma.

Original file backed up as copilot-instructions-backup.md. Updated CHANGELOG.md with timestamp entry.
